Name: Machinist
About the game: If you like to try fresh gameplay, here you can play games made by others, including but not limited to: action, shooting, driving, real-time tactics, chess, party games, etc. You can follow different game authors and put forward your valuable opinions on gameplay. If you have your own game ideas but don't know how to write code, here is a set of drag-and-drop scripting languages ​​with the same level of difficulty as children's programming education software. You can write logic through the mouse and mobile phone touch screen. We also provide a complete editor pipeline, including map editor, mechanical editor, terrain editor, UI editor. In terms of learning, we have built-in a basic official tutorial with pictures and texts. As long as you have ideas and a certain logical thinking ability, a person can also make fun games and get income through our in-app purchase system.
Developers: 上海沙界软件有限公司
Publishers: 游艺春秋网络科技(香港)有限公司
